modName: Jaime Lannister Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My new follower from GoT S7..Jaime Lannister.. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][color=#ff0000][size=6][color=#BF9000]Jaime Lannister Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/color]
[/size][/color][size=3]
[size=4]Just another Character from [/size]
                 HBO's [size=5][color=#6d9eeb]GAME OF THRONES[/color]..

[color=#f4f4f4]I'm ProuD to Present you Ser Jaime Lannister as new follower for Skyrim
(i hope you enjoy)[/color][/size][/size][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][size=3]
[color=#fff2cc][size=4]Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Hessian Sword (jaime Sword).
Location : The Wankin Skeever (Solitude)
Combat Style : Warrior 1H
Vanilla Voice_Nord
..and is unkillable[/size][/color][/size][/size][/b][color=#000000]
[/color]
[color=#7F6000][b][size=5][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=5][b][size=3][size=4][size=3][Credits]
[size=2][size=3]
